This game was made about 3 years ago by me and my friend. At that time we didn't know Android and this app was our "learning" project. When it was done, we got an internship thanks to it, so all that work wasn't in vain. After that, we started learning other languages and frameworks and the game was forgotten for a long time. Having had a bit of spare time, I decided to bring it back to life and upload it, since even though it looks god awful, it contains some pretty interesting questions. 
 
 It is quite obvious at this stage that the game needs a LOT of work on it, but both my friend and I didn't have time to completely redo it from scratch, so I just fixed it up a little bit so it's playable, and if it has enough downloads it will get a full revamp soon.



Please do not hesitate to contact us with your suggestions.
The game was made by: Milan Vucic - vucic94@yahoo.com Nebojsa Urosevic - nebojsa94urosevic@gmail.com


Greetings from the team '2 Facts 1 Fake'.
The goal of the game is to guess which of the 3 given statements is FALSE. So read carefully, and select the one you think is not correct.
You start off with 50 seconds, and for each correct answer, you gain 10 seconds, but for each mistake, you lose 5.
You have these tokens that you can use for 2 different types of in-game help. Also, tokens are awarded at the end of each game. You get 3 times the number of points you won in that game.
This adds another 10 seconds to your time and costs 40 tokens.

Finally, we have points. Each correct answer is worth 2 points, wrong one takes away 1 point and answering 3 questions correctly in a row brings a bonus of 5 points. Let\'s get started!
